tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Christina Grimmie singing "Titanium" - David Guetta feat. Sia
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: YO Team!! Long time no video. Love this song and REALLY wanted to sing it for yu guys, regardless of the repetitiveness of it O___+ LOVE YOU TEAM!! \|/ Check out American Idol awesomeness here!! bit.ly Don't miss a beat! bit.ly TEAM GRIMMIE RAWWWWKS!!!!!!! My Album! :: itunes.apple.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: 1:32 - Close eyes and play the piano ﻿

Christina i have a request, can you please please pleas do the truly madly deeply song for me but the slow version, this is the link to the song, i love love love love love you! you are the﻿ one who has kept me going these past few months while everything has been hard on my family and i <3
oh my god ._. she really can sing one of the most hardest song to sing -_-﻿ haha! <3 <3
Before i hated this song, THANKS!﻿
498 dislikes! bull!!! what is﻿ wrong with you people!?
Of course she can. She﻿ can whistle register. Nobody says that
its called truly madly deeply by cascada,﻿ and its the slow version <3
i miss THE HAIR so much, and the black glove too﻿ :)
2:31 this puts﻿ goosebumps ontop of goosbumps! this cover is so amazing!
U r a really good﻿ singer!
Do we﻿ know what mic she uses? :]
The﻿ last part is sooo cute! xD *salutes back*

Reviewer.Books: The fab confessions of georgia nicolson, the harry potter series, a series of unfortunate events...shows how childish I am!!!
Reviewer.Movies: Miranda, Anything to do wuth harry potter.
Reviewer.Music: Jessie J, but I love any music!!!

Reviewer.Books: Not really interested with books but who knows that i will someday? :D

Reviewer.Music: Justin Drew Bieber. Jordan Jansen, Eminem, Chritina Grimme, Cody Simpson.
